---
title: "Data Visualisation"
output: html_notebook
---

R Data Visualizations options

- Built in Plot() function
  + Predefined visualization
  + No parameters required
  
- ggplot
  + The building blocks for any static visualization
  
- HTML Widgets
  + Interactive Visualization
  + Production ready for the web
  
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(forecast)
```

```{r}
cars
```

```{r}
cars %>% plot()
```

```{r}
forecast(AirPassengers)
```

```{r}
forecast(AirPassengers) %>% plot()
```

Grammar Graphics (ggplot)
